title: Sexual Assault Revelations Turn Canada’s National Game Into the Nation’s Shame
description: Once a jewel of Hockey Canada’s schedule, the world junior tournament is playing to a largely empty arena as turmoil forces Canadians to rethink what they believe about the sport.
dc:creator: Ian Austen
media:description: A pandemic-related rescheduling and the resurfacing of sexual-assault allegations have led to large numbers of empty seats at the World Junior Championship this month, even when Canada plays.
